page.title: 05KNIGHTLOW MIDDLE SCHOOL
page.content: THE{MIDDLE SCHOOL}IN{STRETTON ON {DUNSMORE}HAS SIX CLASSROOMS, TWO CHANGING ROOMS AND A LIBRARY. IT WAS OPENED IN APRIL{1975.}THE POPULATION OF CHILDREN IS ONE HUNDRED AND SIXTY. THERE ARE SEVEN CLASSES, ONE FOR FIRST YEARS, TWO FOR FIRST AND SECOND YEARS AND TWO EACH FOR THIRD AND FOURTH YEARS. THERE ARE TWO PLAYGROUNDS. THERE ARE TWO FOOTBALL PITCHES, A HOCKEY PITCH AND THE TWO PLAYGROUNDS HAVE A NETBALL COURT MARKED ON THEM. THERE IS ALSO A NATURE RESERVE. THE CHANGING ROOMS WERE BUILT IN{1977. THERE ARE SEVEN FULL TIME TEACHERS, TWO PART TIME TEACHERS, AND A HEADMASTER. THERE IS A TELEVISION WITH VIDEO AND ALSO TWO BBC COMPUTERS WHICH ARE USED ALL OVER THE SCHOOL. THE CHILDREN ATTEND THE SCHOOL FROM SEVEN SURROUNDING VILLAGES. THE SCHOOL IS NAMED AFTER THE{KNIGHTLOW HUNDRED}.
